001package net.tvburger.jdl.plots;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004
005import javax.swing.*;
006import java.awt.*;
007
008public class ImageViewer extends JPanel implements DataRenderer {
009
010    private final String label;
011    private final Float[] pixels; // grayscale values (0.0 - 1.0)
012    private final int width;
013    private final int height;
014    private final int scale; // zoom factor to make it visible
015    private JFrame jframe;
016
017    public static ImageViewer fromMnistImage(DataSet.Sample<Float> sample) {
018        String label = "unknown";
019        for (int i = 0; i < sample.targetCount(); i++) {
020            if (sample.targetOutputs()[i] >= 0.9f) {
021                label = Integer.toString(i);
022                break;
023            }
024        }
025        return new ImageViewer(label, sample.features(), 28, 28, 10);
026    }
027
028    public static ImageViewer fromPerceptronImage(String label, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample) {
029        return new ImageViewer(label, sample.features(), 20, 20, 10);
030    }
031
032    public ImageViewer(String label, Float[] pixels, int width, int height, int scale) {
033        if (pixels.length != width * height) {
034            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Pixel array must have " + width + "x" + height + " = " + (width * height) + " elements.");
035        }
036        this.width = width;
037        this.height = height;
038        this.label = label;
039        this.pixels = pixels;
040        this.scale = scale;
041        setPreferredSize(new Dimension(width * scale, height * scale));
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    protected void paintComponent(Graphics g) {
046        super.paintComponent(g);
047        for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
048            for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
049                float value = pixels[y * width + x];
050                g.setColor(new Color(value, value, value)); // grayscale
051                g.fillRect(x * scale, y * scale, scale, scale);
052            }
053        }
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public void display() {
058        if (jframe != null) {
059            return;
060        }
061        JFrame frame = new JFrame(label);
062        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
063        frame.add(this);
064        frame.pack();
065        frame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
066        frame.setVisible(true);
067    }
068}
